stories.headline: Bueckers joins elite company
stories.bodyText:
Bueckers‚Äô 44 points tied for the 10th-most in WNBA history, cementing her performance among the league‚Äôs most memorable scoring outbursts.

The WNBA single-game record is 53 points, set by Liz Cambage in 2018.

stories.headline: Mother Tucker!
stories.bodyText:
Tucker‚Äôs contract expires after the 2025 season, meaning his performance down the stretch could impact both his market value and the Cubs‚Äô willingness to keep him.

Tucker still started the All-Star Game in 2025, his fourth career selection and his first as a starter. He missed time in 2024 with a shin fracture but has otherwise been one of MLB‚Äôs most durable outfielders.

stories.headline: Get him bubble wrapped!
stories.bodyText:
Jackson was accidentally stepped on and knocked to the ground during practice, but remained on the field briefly before heading inside early with trainers.

The Ravens haven‚Äôt played Jackson in a preseason game in 4 years to reduce injury risk. His brash, running style of play can lead to injuries.

stories.headline: Rox Rock Shohei
stories.bodyText:
Even before the Rockies loss, Ohtani had been limited ‚Äî he has not thrown more than 4‚Öì innings or 80 pitches in any start this season.	

Ohtani missed the entire 2024 season recovering from elbow surgery, making 2025 his comeback year on the mound.

stories.headline: Messi, messy
stories.bodyText:
Messi felt hamstring discomfort in his 45-minute return vs. LA Galaxy, missed training, and was ruled out of the Tigres match.

Messi had to leave Miami‚Äôs earlier Leagues Cup game vs. Necaxa after just 11 minutes with the same injury.

stories.headline: KC SF Trade
stories.bodyText:
The 49ers‚Äô WR room is depleted with Aiyuk, Robinson, Watkins, and Cowing all uncertain for Week 1, and Jauan Jennings also nursing a calf injury.

Moore just returned a punt 88 yards for a touchdown in Kansas City‚Äôs preseason game vs. Seattle.
